CodeBlockMethod.Name: occupy_UI_on
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer)then return end self.occupy_UI.Enable = true local a = function() self.occupy_UI.Enable = false end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,5)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Ban
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.lv == 1 then self.Ban1.Enable = false elseif self.lv == 2 then self.Ban2.Enable = false elseif self.lv == 3 then self.Ban3.Enable = false end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if(self.buildUI.Enable == false) then return end -- 3가지 건물 중 어떤 건물을 건설할 지 키보드 숫자 1,2,3으로 결정 if(self.E.BuildZone.buildable and self.E.BuildZone.is_left == self.Entity.Common.is_left) then if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then if (key == KeyboardKey.Q and self.lv >= 1) then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:LeftBuildOne(self.lv) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.W and self.lv >= 2)then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:LeftBuildTwo(self.lv) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.E and self.lv >= 3) then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:LeftBuildThree(self.lv) end elseif self.Entity.Common.is_left == false then if (key == KeyboardKey.Q and self.lv >= 1) then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:RightBuildOne(self.lv) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.W and self.lv >= 2)then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:RightBuildTwo(self.lv) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.E and self.lv >= 3) then self.buildUI.Enable = false self.E.BuildZone:RightBuildThree(self.lv) end end end
